# Import the necessary packages
import uvicorn
from fastapi import FastAPI,
ArgumentParser,
File,
UploadFile,
FastFinal

app = FastAPI()
n_args = ArgumentParser().parse_args()
n = FastFinal(app)
parsed_args.argv = ["cli", "--input", "test.txt"]

n.add_command("greet", greet)
def greet():
    parsed_args = n_args.parse_args()
    with open(parsed_args.input, 'r') as f:
        print(f'Hello, {f.read()}!')
if __name__ == "__main__":
